item.title: Comenzando con jhipster
item.description: Instalación de JHipster en Windows # Instale Java 8 desde el sitio web de Oracle. (Opcional) Instale una herramienta de compilación de Java. Whether you choose to use Maven or Gradle, you normally don’t have to install anything, as JHipster will automatically install the Maven Wrapper or the Gradle Wrapper for you. If you don’t want to use those wrappers, go to the official Maven website or Gradle website to do your own installation.
